forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers. Partly cloudy. Low around 44, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. East northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 4pm. Mostly sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the evening wraps San Francisco in a gentle embrace, there’s a lightness in the air—a hint of moisture that fills the atmosphere, bringing with it a whisper of impending rain. The city, adorned in a shroud of partly cloudy skies, flickers with reflections of urban life below. The temperature dances between the coolness of 44 and a mild rise that promises a snug retreat from the chill overnight. Gales from the east-northeast playfully stir the city, contributing to the tantalizing ambiance of the night, with gusts that remind us to hold on to our hats.

Gazing ahead to Sunday, a slight chance of rain showers could drop in before the clock strikes four, but for now, the sun is poised to reclaim its role, casting soft rays that will warm the day to a breathtaking 56 degrees. It is a day not to be overlooked, particularly with the promise of a mostly sunny afternoon. A hint of wind, again from the northeast, might entice one to put on an extra layer, yet it holds the power to invigorate an afternoon stroll. As fog recedes to reveal the outlines of the cityscape, it will be perfect for indulging in simple pleasures—a leisurely brunch atop a hill or perhaps a coffee in hand while wandering along the waterfront, taking in the beautiful juxtaposition of the iconic Golden Gate and the enchanting Bay. For those seeking solace, a quiet reading nook at home, paired with the sound of raindrops—a comforting duet if the skies decide to shed their moisture—could also be a lovely way to savor the day.
